import React from "react"; import Logo from '../../components/Logo'; import dados from "./inicialData"; import LinkBtn from "../../components/LinkBtn"; import Container from "../../auxiliar/Container"; import { FaGlobe, FaSortDown } from 'react-icons/fa' const dadosHome = dados.initialText.home; const dadosBenefits = dados.initialText.benefits; export default function Initial() { return ( <>

{dadosHome.title}

{dadosHome.subtitle}

{dadosHome.formText}

{dadosBenefits.map((item, key) => (

{item.title}

{item.subtitle}
))}
) }
